mapper.select: select * from scenic where id=#{id} UNION select * from scenic where id <> #{id}
SELECT * from scenic WHERE name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"
select audio_id,scenic_id,box_id,scenic_name, CONCAT(audio_name," ",audio_money,"å…ƒ") as audio_name_and_money from audio where scenic_id = #{scenicId}

SELECT scenic.id,scenic.`name`,scenic.list,scenic.picture_path,scenic.text,audio.audio_id,audio.box_id,audio.scenic_name,audio.audio_url,audio.audio_name,audio.audio_money FROM scenic,audio WHERE scenic.id = audio.scenic_id AND audio.audio_id = #{audioId}
select id from scenic where name = #{name}
select b.* from t_buy b,t_user u where u.open_id=#{openId} and u.user_id = b.user_id
select * from t_user u where u.open_id = #{openId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_buy(scenic_id,scenic_name,user_id,nick_name,audio_id,audio_name,audio_money,buy_time) SELECT scenic_id,scenic_name,u.user_id,u.nick_name,audio_id,audio_name,audio_money,now() FROM audio,t_user u WHERE audio_id = #{audioId} AND u.open_id = #{openId}
mapper.update: update scenic set picture_path = #{picture_path} where id = #{id}
update scenic set audio_path = #{audio_path} where id = #{id}
update scenic set picture_path = #{picture_path} where name = #{name}
update scenic set audio_path = #{audio_path} where name = #{name}
